mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_SEQ_MAIN ( SEQID, SEQKEY, SEQDESC, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{seqid}, #{seqkey}, #{seqdesc}, #{createuser}, now() )
INSERT INTO SYS_SEQ_SETTING ( SEQSETINGID, SEQID, SEQTYPE, SEQORDER, SEQTYPEVALUE ) VALUES ( #{seqsetingid}, #{seqid}, #{seqtype}, #{seqorder}, #{seqtypevalue} )
mapper.select:
SELECT SEQKEY "seqkey" ,SEQOWNER "seqowner" ,SEQVALUE "seqvalue" ,date_format(CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') "createdate" FROM SYS_SEQ_VALUE where SEQKEY=#{seqkey}
AND SEQOWNER=#{seqowner}
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_SEQ_VALUE SET SEQVALUE=#{seqvalue} WHERE SEQKEY=#{seqkey} AND SEQOWNER=#{seqowner}
mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='1' THEN A.SEQTYPEVALUE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='2' THEN (SELECT date_format(now(),A.SEQTYPEVALUE) FROM DUAL) WHEN A.SEQTYPE='3' THEN (SELECT LPAD(${seqvalue},A.SEQTYPEVALUE,'0') FROM DUAL) END ) "itemValue" FROM SYS_SEQ_SETTING A WHERE A.SEQKEY=#{seqkey} ORDER BY A.SEQORDER ASC
